TopicTitle: Nice timing with the Indian moon Rover news

Articles.Content: My Nine year old daughter and I spend a lot of time creating creating in KSP,  She/We have learned through trial and error the limitations and unexpected problems when constructing....Now KSP2 is announced We look forward to many more Kerbals floating, falling, exploding, screaming, experimenting,  orbiting, exploring...and general mayhem.
